metadata.title: CVE-2022-47665 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Libde265 1.0.9 has a heap buffer overflow vulnerability inde265_image::set_SliceAddrRS(int, int, int)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47665` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libde265-0 - 1.0.4-1ubuntu0.3
libde265-examples - 1.0.4-1ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libde265 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.4-1ubuntu0.3').
